duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform in vivo animal procedures, including dosing animals by various routes, measuring tumors by calipers, and non-invasive imaging.
Perform efficacy and tolerability testing in mouse cancer models, including mouse necropsy and tissue collection.
Contribute to overall vivarium organization and IACUC protocols.
Document, analyze, and report on animal models, PK, and PD studies.
Work collaboratively with the discovery biology team and provide summaries to project teams.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in the field of immunology, pharmacology, biology or related discipline with 5 years industry experiences or BS degree with 10 years in the preclinical development of cancer immunotherapies.
